summary: This document contains detailed records of outgoing wire transfers associated with ELLMAX, LLC, including transaction dates, amounts, and beneficiary information. The records indicate a pattern of cash transfers to R and C Ventures Inc, suggesting potential financial activities related to the Epstein case.

keyFacts: Multiple wire transfers were made by ELLMAX, LLC to R and C Ventures Inc.
The document details transactions spanning from 2014 to 2017.
The amounts of the wire transfers vary, with some exceeding $1,000.
The records indicate a consistent pattern of financial transactions involving ELLMAX, LLC and R and C Ventures Inc.
